channel.title: Storytimes on RadioBed
channel.description: Recent content in Storytimes on RadioBed

item.title: Dream March Moon
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: March 7th: She is off to New Zealand Experience: A snake for leaving a snake for lying A familiar adversary appeared in his young spiritual guide form along with his powerful master.

item.title: apples for the island
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: The island was as I remembered. A tropical paradise. Rich green accented with vibrant orange red and yellow flora. I walk the dirt road from my home to the terrea market.

item.title: Trinity’s Child
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: A child with three faces. “Special people know, Jerad is good for the island(s)” Moisture of life drained into her core. Buttermilk skin turned to scales. Crack; shatter; fade to gray.

item.title: Sould Crunching
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Soul Crunching Smash pound jaw dropping On the chase hunting for fill; not taste Filling on what but nothing. Empty in all things, sustenance key among them Full of used air.

item.title: Synthetic and Intelligently Unaware
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Synthetic How does madness ensue? Do we run out of money Unable to produce food. War, famine, social injustice So many disparities our vulnerability’s would make us cry Instead, synthesize something new

item.title: Reflecting on Introspective Hymns
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Rhythmic Circle 10pm the beach is cool with a slight breeze. Lit by a full moon. Impromptu bon fire encourages skins to shed and souls to sore. Eyes caught across the flame introduces who I am.

item.title: Soul Film
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Metaphor: The human soul is like a film Born completely empty of anything worldly, no light has touched the surface of the film up to the moment of birth. This is a new soul; a blank film.

item.title: Black Hole-New-World
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Big Bag to Big Freeze As our universe presses on past 13.5 billion years, age gets the best of it. The ever accelerating expansion, dark energy and dark matter press us toward a big freeze.

item.title: The Plan
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: What must go on in that mind? I get it. I often wonder the same thing and can find myself spiralling into these introspective circles. Accomplishments As an outthinker of conscious beings on and off planet, I have reached some of my greatest accomplishments

item.title: Soul Film Definitions
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Film Spirit Film is a metaphor to describe the human concept of a spirit. Additional efforts to allow the human spirit to be described in attributes similar to those used to describe these new conscious beings such as scanners Scanner

item.title: Soul Film New Game
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)

item.title: Soul Film Reincarnate
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Lets explore The Secret and Reincarnation with regard to the Soul as a Film. When as film is used, colors form from developing the burning of light onto it self.
